value.title: StarCraft 2: Has SPEEDRUNS a Best-of-7 vs GuMiho!
value.excerpt: Best-of-7 series of high level StarCraft 2 between Has and GuMiho. In this Protoss versus Terran Has decides to speed run the games, as he just simply won't stop cheesing. The issue however, is that he's playing against one of the trickiest Terran players. GuMiho is well familiar with this early game
